Detailed Description

See also:
LogLevel

Member Data Documentation

LogLevel cLogLevel::globalRuntimeLoglevel [static]

This log level specifies a globally applied runtime modifiable filter.

This is the fastest runtime filter, it works with a simple integer comparison at the call site.
